search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=CPU_ALL $OStype$ | head 10000 | stats count by hostname | sort hostname
eventtype=nmon:performance $hostname$ | stats count by OStype | fields OStype | head 1

html.p: - - - - - - - - - - Action required: please select your server name(s) in the host selector above - - - - - - - - - -
Searching for nmon performance data did not returned any result, please ensure at least one host is correctly configured to generate performance data. (search for eventtype=nmon:performance)

SYSTEM SUMMARY OVERVIEW Search returned no results, The nmon inventory data may not be available yet or not available for this host only, manually run the Nmon Inventory Generation report or wait for the auto update. (occurs every hour by default)

search.query: | inputlookup nmon_inventory | search $OStype$ $hostname$ | eval "Operating System"=case(OStype=="AIX", ("IBM AIX " + AIX_LEVEL), OStype=="Linux", Linux_distribution, OStype=="Solaris", if(isnotnull(Solaris_version), Solaris_version, Solaris_sunOS_version)) | fields hostname,OStype,cpu_cores,Processor,Physical_mem_MB,Virtual_mem_MB,"Operating System",nmon_version | fillnull value="N/A" | rename Physical_mem_MB AS "Physical memory (MB)", Virtual_mem_MB AS "Virtual memory (MB)" | $show_config$

eventtype=nmon:performance (type=CPU_ALL OR type=LPAR) $OStype$ $hostname$ | eval cpu_load_percent=if(isnotnull(lpar_vp_usage_PCT), lpar_vp_usage_PCT, cpu_load_percent) | timechart span=5m avg(cpu_load_percent) AS value | where isnotnull(value)
eventtype=nmon:performance type=MEM $OStype$ $hostname$ | timechart span=5m avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS value | where isnotnull(value)
eventtype=nmon:performance type=MEM $OStype$ $hostname$ | timechart span=5m avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS value | where isnotnull(value)

chart.title: Deployment global % CPU stats over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance (type=CPU_ALL OR type=LPAR) $OStype$ $hostname$ | eval cpu_load_percent=if(isnotnull(lpar_vp_usage_PCT), lpar_vp_usage_PCT, cpu_load_percent) | timechart `nmon_span` avg(cpu_load_percent) AS cpu_load_percent | $show_cpu$ | trendline sma5(cpu_load_percent) AS trend

chart.title: Deployment per category % CPU stats over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance (type=CPU_ALL OR type=LPAR) $OStype$ $hostname$ | eval Sys_PCT=if(isnotnull(VP_Sys_PCT), VP_Sys_PCT, Sys_PCT), User_PCT=if(isnotnull(VP_User_PCT), VP_User_PCT, User_PCT), Wait_PCT=if(isnotnull(VP_Wait_PCT), VP_Wait_PCT, Wait_PCT), Idle_PCT=if(isnotnull(VP_Idle_PCT), VP_Idle_PCT, Idle_PCT) | timechart `nmon_span` avg(Sys_PCT) AS Sys_PCT, avg(User_PCT) AS User_PCT, avg(Wait_PCT) AS Wait_PCT, avg(Idle_PCT) AS Idle_PCT | $show_cpu$ | fields _time,Idle_PCT,Wait_PCT,User_PCT,Sys_PCT

chart.title: By host global % CPU stats over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance (type=CPU_ALL OR type=LPAR) $OStype$ $hostname$ | eval cpu_load_percent=if(isnotnull(lpar_vp_usage_PCT), lpar_vp_usage_PCT, cpu_load_percent) | timechart `nmon_span` avg(cpu_load_percent) AS cpu_load_percent by hostname | $show_cpu$

chart.title: Deployment physical memory MB usage per category over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname | stats sum(cached) AS cached, sum(buffers) AS buffers, sum(mem_free) AS mem_free, sum(mem_used_effective) AS mem_used_effective, sum(memtotal) AS memtotal by _time | $show_phymem$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(*) AS * | fields _time,mem_free,cached,buffers,mem_used_effective,memtotal

chart.title: Deployment physical memory % usage over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=MEM $OStype$ $hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS mem_used_effective_PCT | $show_phymem$ | trendline sma5(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS trend

chart.title: By host physical memory % usage over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=MEM $OStype$ $hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(mem_used_effective_PCT) AS mem_used_effective_PCT by hostname | $show_phymem$

chart.title: Deployment swap memory MB usage per category over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance:memory type=MEM $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname | stats sum(swap_used) AS swap_used, sum(swap) AS swaptotal, sum(swap_free) AS swap_free by _time | $show_virtualmem$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(*) AS *

chart.title: Deployment swap memory % usage over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=MEM $OStype$ $hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS swap_used_effective_PCT | $show_virtualmem$ | trendline sma5(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS trend

chart.title: By host swap memory % usage over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=MEM $OStype$ $hostname$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(swap_used_effective_PCT) AS swap_used_effective_PCT by hostname | $show_virtualmem$
eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKXFER $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname,value | stats sum(value) AS value by _time | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS value | where isnotnull(value)

single.title: Average deployment % of time busy disks

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBUSY $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname,value | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS value | where isnotnull(value)

single.title: Average deployment disk data transfer size

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBSIZE $OStype$ $hostname$ | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS value | where isnotnull(value)

chart.title: Deployment global I/O per sec over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKXFER $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname,device,value | stats sum(value) AS value by _time | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS iops | $show_diskxfer$ | trendline sma5(iops) AS trend

chart.title: By host I/O per sec over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKXFER $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname,value | stats sum(value) AS value by _time,hostname | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS iops by hostname | $show_diskxfer$

chart.title: Deployment global % time busy disk over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBUSY $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname,value | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS busy_disk | $show_diskbusy$ | trendline sma5(busy_disk) AS trend

chart.title: By host % time busy disk over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBUSY $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname,value | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS busydisk by hostname | $show_diskbusy$

chart.title: Deployment global % time busy disk over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBSIZE $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname,value | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS tranfer_rate | $show_diskbsize$ | trendline sma5(iops) AS trend

chart.title: By host % time busy disk over time

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBSIZE $OStype$ $hostname$ | dedup _time,hostname,value | timechart span=5m avg(value) AS tranfer_rate by hostname | $show_diskbsize$

single.title: Average deployment CPU usage main process

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=TOP $OStype$ $hostname$ Command=* | dedup _time,hostname,Command,PID | stats max(pct_CPU) AS pct_CPU, max(logical_cpus) AS logical_cpus by _time,hostname,Command,PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU, last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,hostname,Command | eval value=(pct_CPU/100) | bucket _time `nmon_span` | stats max(value) As value by _time,hostname,Command | stats sum(value) AS value by _time,Command | stats avg(value) AS value by Command | sort - value

html.p: Search returned no results, TOP collection (processes activity) may have not been activated at nmon binary startup or no processes activity could be captured. (use the -t or -T option to activate the TOP collection)

single.title: Average deployment Memory usage main process

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=TOP $OStype$ $hostname$ Command=* | dedup _time,hostname,Command,PID | eval mem_usage_mb=case(match(OStype, "AIX|Linux"), ((ResSet)/1024), match(OStype, "Solaris"), (ResSize/1024) ) | stats sum(mem_usage_mb) As mem_usage_mb by _time,hostname,Command | stats avg(mem_usage_mb) AS mem_usage_mb by _time,Command | stats avg(mem_usage_mb) AS mem_usage_mb by Command | sort - mem_usage_mb

html.p: Search returned no results, TOP collection (processes activity) may have not been at nmon binary startup or no processes activity could be captured. (use the -t or -T option to activate the TOP collection)

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=NET $OStype$ $hostname$ device!=*lo* | eval traffic_type=case(match(device, ".+read.+"), "In", match(device, ".+write.+"), "Out") | chart avg(value) AS value by traffic_type | eval value=round(value, 2) | fields value | transpose | eval value='row 1' + " / " + 'row 2' | fields value | where isnotnull(value)

chart.title: Deployment TOP 10 CPU processes usage

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=TOP $OStype$ $hostname$ Command=* | stats max(pct_CPU) AS pct_CPU, max(logical_cpus) AS logical_cpus by _time,hostname,Command,PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU, last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,hostname,Command | eval value=(pct_CPU/100) | where value>0.01 | bucket _time `nmon_span` | stats max(value) As value by _time,hostname,Command | stats sum(value) AS value by _time,Command | $show_cpuprocess$ | timechart `nmon_span` limit=10 useother=f max(value) AS value by Command

chart.title: By host TOP 10 CPU processes usage

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=TOP $OStype$ $hostname$ Command=* | stats max(pct_CPU) AS pct_CPU, max(logical_cpus) AS logical_cpus by _time,hostname,Command,PID | eval limit=(logical_cpus*100) | where (pct_CPU<=limit) | stats sum(pct_CPU) As pct_CPU, last(logical_cpus) As logical_cpus by _time,hostname,Command | eval value=(pct_CPU/100) | where value>0.01 | eval key=hostname+":"+Command | $show_cpuprocess$ | timechart `nmon_span` limit=10 useother=f max(value) As value by key

chart.title: Deployment TOP 10 Memory processes usage

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=TOP $OStype$ $hostname$ Command=* | dedup _time,hostname,Command,PID | eval mem_usage_mb=case(match(OStype, "Linux"), ((ResSet)/1024), match(OStype, "AIX"), ((ResData+ResText)/1024), match(OStype, "Solaris"), (ResSize/1024) ) | stats sum(mem_usage_mb) As mem_usage_mb by _time,hostname,Command | stats avg(mem_usage_mb) AS mem_usage_mb by _time,Command | $show_memprocess$ | timechart `nmon_span` limit=10 useother=f max(mem_usage_mb) AS mem_usage_mb by Command

chart.title: By host TOP 10 Memory processes usage

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=TOP $OStype$ $hostname$ Command=* | dedup _time,hostname,Command,PID | eval mem_usage_mb=case(match(OStype, "Linux"), ((ResSet)/1024), match(OStype, "AIX"), ((ResData+ResText)/1024), match(OStype, "Solaris"), (ResSize/1024) ) | stats max(mem_usage_mb) AS mem_usage_mb by _time,hostname,Command,PID | stats sum(mem_usage_mb) As mem_usage_mb by _time,hostname,Command | eval key=hostname+":"+Command | $show_memprocess$ | timechart `nmon_span` limit=10 useother=f max(mem_usage_mb) As mem_usage_mb by key

chart.title: Deployment Inbound/Outbound network traffic

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=NET $OStype$ $hostname$ device!=*lo* | eval traffic_type=case(match(device, ".+read.+"), "Inbound", match(device, ".+write.+"), "Outbound") | $show_net$ | timechart `nmon_span` avg(value) AS KBps by traffic_type

chart.title: By host Inbound/Outbound network traffic

search.query: eventtype=nmon:performance type=NET $OStype$ $hostname$ device!=*lo* | eval traffic_type=case(match(device, ".+read.+"), "Inbound", match(device, ".+write.+"), "Outbound") | eval key=hostname+":"+traffic_type | $show_net$ | timechart `nmon_span` useother=f limit=0 avg(value) AS KBps by key
